players.name: Alice
memory: Charlie: "Charlie is the detective and knows who the mafioso is."
Charlie: "Charlie will continue to investigate and gather more information. The mafioso's silence during the day is suspicious, but we need more evidence before making any accusations."
Bob: "I will remain silent. The detective's statement was interesting, but I don't have enough information to make any accusations or guesses about who the mafioso might be."
You: "Charlie, your statement was quite revealing. I'm the mafioso and I killed Diana last night. However, I will continue to play my role carefully."
